_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The wanderers who follow other paths reg: form as self, self as having form, form in self, or self in form
feeling as self, self as having feeling, feeling in self, or self in feeling
perception as self, self as having perception, perception in self, or self in perception
choices as self, self as having choices, choices in self, or self in choices
consciousness as self, self as having consciousness, consciousness in self, or self in consciousness.
